summary.span: 命名空间包含管理远程对象生存期的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that manage the lifetime of remote objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传统上，分布式的垃圾回收使用引用计数和 ping 来控制对象的生存期。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control over the lifetime of objects. 这适用于有几个客户端每一项服务，但不当随之扩展有数千个的每个服务的客户端。This works well when there are a few clients per service, but doesn't scale well when there are thousands of clients per service. 远程处理生存期服务将租约与每个服务相关联，并当其租约时间过期时将删除服务。The remoting lifetime service associates a lease with each service, and deletes a service when its lease time expires. 生存期服务可能需要对传统的分布式垃圾回收器中，该函数，它还将调整也的每个服务器的客户端数量的增加时。The lifetime service can take on the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and it also adjusts well when the numbers of clients per server increases. 每个应用程序域包含负责控制其域中的租约的租约管理器。Each application domain contains a lease manager that is responsible for controlling leases in its domain. 所有租约将定期都检查过期的租约时间。All leases are examined periodically for expired lease times. 如果租约已过期，一个或多个该租约的发起人调用并有机会在续订租约。If a lease has expired, one or more of the lease's sponsors are invoked and given the opportunity to renew the lease. 如果无发起人决定续订租约的租用管理器删除租约，并可以通过垃圾回收器收集对象。If none of the sponsors decides to renew the lease, the lease manager removes the lease and the object can be collected by the garbage collector. 租用管理器维护具有按剩余租约时间排序的租约的租约列表。The lease manager maintains a lease list with leases sorted by remaining lease time. 剩余时间最短租赁时间存储在列表顶部。The leases with the shortest remaining time are stored at the top of the list.
